name: geoscience-skills
description: 29 geoscience skills for AI coding assistants covering seismic, well logs, geological modelling, geophysical inversion, geostatistics, and more.
author: Geoscience Skills

plugins.name: obspy
plugins.description: Seismology data processing with ObsPy. Read waveforms, fetch FDSN data, filter signals, remove instrument response, search earthquakes. Use when working with seismic waveforms or earthquake data.

plugins.name: segyio
plugins.description: Read, write, and manipulate SEG-Y seismic data files. Fast trace/header/inline/crossline access. Use when working with SEG-Y format seismic data.

plugins.name: disba
plugins.description: Compute surface wave dispersion curves for layered Earth models. Rayleigh/Love wave phase and group velocities, sensitivity kernels. Use for surface wave analysis or tomography.

plugins.name: lasio
plugins.description: Read, write, and manipulate LAS well log files. Parse headers, extract curves, handle problematic files. Use when working with LAS format well data.

plugins.name: welly
plugins.description: Well data analysis toolkit. Load wells from LAS, process curves, manage formation tops, multi-well projects. Use for well log analysis workflows.

plugins.name: dlisio
plugins.description: Read and parse DLIS/LIS well log files. Extract curves, metadata, handle multi-frame files. Use when working with DLIS/RP66 format well logs.

plugins.name: striplog
plugins.description: Create, visualize, and analyze lithological and stratigraphic logs. Well correlation, net-to-gross ratios. Use for lithology columns and stratigraphic visualization.

plugins.name: petropy
plugins.description: Petrophysical analysis and formation evaluation. Calculate porosity, water saturation, permeability from well logs. Use for petrophysical interpretation.

plugins.name: gempy
plugins.description: 3D structural geological modeling using implicit methods. Faults, folds, unconformities from surface points and orientations. Use for 3D geological model construction.

plugins.name: loopstructural
plugins.description: 3D geological modelling with implicit surfaces, faults, and folds. Use for structural geological modelling from field data.

plugins.name: gemgis
plugins.description: Spatial data processing for GemPy geological modelling. Extract interfaces from maps, sample DEMs, convert GIS formats. Use for preparing geospatial data for 3D modelling.

plugins.name: simpeg
plugins.description: Geophysical forward modelling and inversion framework. DC resistivity, magnetics, gravity, EM methods. Use for geophysical data inversion.

plugins.name: devito
plugins.description: Symbolic PDE solver with automatic code generation. Seismic wave propagation, FWI, RTM. Use for finite-difference wave simulation.

plugins.name: pylops
plugins.description: Linear operators for inverse problems. Deconvolution, imaging, signal processing. Use for matrix-free inverse problems at scale.

plugins.name: pygimli
plugins.description: Multi-method geophysical inversion framework. ERT, seismic refraction, IP. Use for near-surface geophysical data inversion.

plugins.name: harmonica
plugins.description: Gravity and magnetic data processing and forward modelling. Terrain corrections, equivalent sources, derivative filters. Use for potential field analysis.

plugins.name: bruges
plugins.description: Geophysical equations and rock physics. AVO, Gassmann fluid substitution, wavelets, elastic moduli. Use for rock physics calculations and seismic modeling.

plugins.name: verde
plugins.description: Spatial data gridding and interpolation with ML-style API. Spline, linear, block reduction, cross-validation. Use for gridding scattered spatial data.

plugins.name: geostatspy
plugins.description: GSLIB-inspired geostatistics. Variograms, kriging, sequential Gaussian simulation. Use for geostatistical analysis and spatial estimation.

plugins.name: scikit-gstat
plugins.description: Geostatistics with scikit-learn API. Variogram fitting, ordinary kriging, directional analysis. Use for geostatistical interpolation with modern API.

plugins.name: pastas
plugins.description: Groundwater time series analysis and modelling. Transfer function models for well response to recharge/pumping. Use for hydrogeological time series analysis.

plugins.name: landlab
plugins.description: Landscape evolution and surface process modelling. Erosion, flow routing, hillslope diffusion. Use for geomorphological modelling.

plugins.name: mplstereonet
plugins.description: Stereonet plots for structural geology. Great circles, poles, density contours, fold axis analysis. Use for structural orientation data visualization.

plugins.name: pyrolite
plugins.description: Geochemistry data analysis and visualization. REE spider diagrams, TAS classification, compositional transforms. Use for geochemical data analysis.

plugins.name: gprpy
plugins.description: Ground-penetrating radar data processing. Dewow, gain, filters, velocity analysis, depth conversion. Use for GPR profile processing.

plugins.name: mtpy
plugins.description: Magnetotelluric data processing and modelling. EDI files, impedance tensors, phase tensors, pseudosections. Use for MT data analysis.

plugins.name: xarray
plugins.description: N-dimensional labeled arrays for geoscience. NetCDF, climate/ocean data, temporal aggregation, Dask integration. Use for multi-dimensional scientific data.

plugins.name: pyvista
plugins.description: 3D visualization and mesh analysis. Geological models, seismic volumes, point clouds, surfaces. Use for 3D geoscience visualization.

plugins.name: pooch
plugins.description: Data file fetching and caching. Download with checksum verification, archive extraction, data registries. Use for reproducible data downloads.

plugins.name: seismic-interpretation
plugins.description: End-to-end seismic interpretation workflow from SEG-Y loading through signal processing, rock physics, and visualization.

plugins.name: well-log-evaluation
plugins.description: Complete well log evaluation workflow from LAS/DLIS loading through QC, petrophysical analysis, lithology, and visualization.

plugins.name: geological-modelling
plugins.description: 3D geological modelling workflow from spatial data preparation through implicit surface modelling and 3D visualization.

plugins.name: geophysical-inversion
plugins.description: Geophysical data inversion workflow from data loading through mesh creation, inversion, and result visualization.

plugins.name: rock-physics-avo
plugins.description: Rock physics and AVO analysis workflow from well log preparation through elastic properties, fluid substitution, and synthetics.
